name: NAIJAVERSE.DAO
description:
IMPLEMENTATION OF DECENTRALIZED FINANCIAL SYSTEM THROUGH BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY & ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE USING VIRTUAL REALITY


NAIJAVERSE is a Metaverse Project that represents Giant of Africa in the Metaverse focused on the traditional heritage and cultural strength of Africa’s Giant in the Metaverse that also aims to unlock the full potential of blockchain technologies by developing an ecosystem of decentralized entertainment & earnings such P2E Games & L2E that exist on chain with a community of collectors, traders and gamers. The project's assets (Non Fungible Tokens) serve as avatar tokens that grant holders in-game ownership of their Naijaverse avatars which best represents themselves. These assets can be utilized/integrated in any of the games the company or its partners develop, allowing players to earn rewards and tokens across platforms and game modes. These assets can also be traded, bought or resold in the secondary marketplace, Such as Naijanfts Marketplace also known as Africa’s Giant Marketplace, etc.
payDisclosure: To all potential contributors NaijaVerse will be the number one go to Metaverse for Africa Giant Market and we have big goal and plans with doxed founders and team members, together we will all work together and fulfil our roadmap to our best abilities using the resources that will be contributed.
